General.Name: ROUTE MOBILE LIMITED
General.Description: Route Mobile Limited provides cloud-communication platform services to enterprises, over-the-top players, and mobile network operators in Africa, the Asia Pacific, Europe, the Middle East, and the America. The company offers business messaging, voice, email, short messaging service (SMS) filtering, analytics, and monetisation solutions. It also provides its cloud-communication services to clients in the banking and financial, aviation, retail, e-commerce, logistics, healthcare, hospitality, media and entertainment, pharmaceuticals, and telecom sectors. Route Mobile Limited was incorporated in 2004 and is headquartered in Mumbai, India.
